summary: Provides context manager utilities that automatically register and invoke cleanup callbacks when a code block terminates due to an exception (excluding SystemExit) or an operating‑system signal, and also on normal program exit, ensuring resources are released in a last‑in‑first‑out order.
business_intent: Enables Certbot to perform reliable cleanup of temporary files, locks, network connections, and other resources even when the process is interrupted by errors or termination signals, thereby preventing resource leaks and ensuring graceful shutdown.
